ygData.subject: They're Off!
ygData.msgSnippet: All the 4 Decepticons could do was shrug to one another and transform into their vehicle modes, following Maxima back to the base she d mentioned. Diesel

All the 4 Decepticons could do was shrug to one another and transform into 
their vehicle modes, following Maxima back to the base she'd mentioned.

Diesel Runner and Blue Flame making the slowest progress due to their large 
semi-modes. And even then, the flame-streaked 2nd in command had an easier 
time with the terrain then his commander. Who carried a long, black trailer 
behind embodied with the Decepticon symbol.
But she putted along contently and quietly...as Sand Storm rushed on ahead 
of them all. Babbling in his excitement about studying this base Maxima was 
leading them too.
Dark Cloud just flew overhead at an easy pace, taking everything in stride.
